content: Deploy Hugo and Further The following operations is based on the post, “Hugo With LoveIt Theme Configuration”, which requires you have already installed and config both Hugo and LoveIt theme.
title: Deploy Hugo and Further

content: 1. Deploy Hugo on Github Assume you have already got a Github account. Create a Github Repository, name this repository as yourgithubname.github.io. Open your terminal, and cd to your blog folder. Run following command lines: hugo --theme=loveit --baseUrl="https://yourgithubname.github.io/" # To build static pages, which will generate public folder cd public git init git remote add origin https://github.com/yourgithubname/yourgithubname.github.io.git git add . git commit -m "first commit" git push After a few seconds, your blog is online!
title: Deploy Hugo and Further

content: 1. Add Comment Box to Your Blog 1-1. Install utterances on your repo. The easiest way for you to add comment box is adding utterances.es comment box. Here is the brief intruduction of utterances.es: https://utteranc.es/ 1-2. Open quickstart/config.toml file, and set utterances.es related setting like following. [params.page.comment.utterances] enable = true # owner/repo repo = "yourgithubname/yourgithubname.github.io" issueTerm = "pathname" label = "" lightTheme = "github-light" darkTheme = "github-dark" 1-3. Set enable = false under [params.page.comment.valine] 1-4. Rebuild your blog and redeploy your public folder. 1-5. Enjoy commenting🍻
title: Deploy Hugo and Further

content: 2. Add Advanced Search (Algolia) Ability to Your Blog 2-1. Create algolia account: https://www.algolia.com/ 2-2. Create an application under your algolia account; [Choose Experienced User, continue all the way down] 2-3. Configure your application; [Click Indice in the left sidebar, click Create Index in the right sidebar just pop out, choose a name you like as Index name] 2-4. Add your algolia application related API Keys into your config.toml file. You can find API Key on the sidebar in algolia website. [languages.en.params.search] enable = true # 搜索引擎的类型 ("lunr", "algolia") type = "algolia" # 文章内容最长索引长度 contentLength = 4000 # 搜索框的占位提示语 placeholder = "" # 最大结果数目 maxResultLength = 10 # 结果内容片段长度 snippetLength = 50 # 搜索结果中高亮部分的 HTML 标签 highlightTag = "em" # 是否在搜索索引中使用基于 baseURL 的绝对路径 absoluteURL = true [languages.en.params.search.algolia] index = "application-name" appID = "Application ID" searchKey = "Search-Only API Key" # 主页信息设置 2-5. Uncomment home = ["HTML", "RSS", "JSON"] under [outputs] in your config.toml file [outputs] home = ["HTML", "RSS", "JSON"] # page = ["HTML", "MarkDown"] # section = ["HTML", "RSS"] # taxonomy = ["HTML", "RSS"] # taxonomyTerm = ["HTML"] 2-6. Cd to your blog directory and Rebuild Hugo Blog. You can find there is a index.json file under quickstart/public folder. Upload index.json to your algolia application 2-7. Redeploy your site, enjoy searching!
title: Deploy Hugo and Further

content: 3. A Proper Way to Add Image in Your Post Create a folder after your post’s name under static folder; For example your post’s file name is proper.md, so your image1 in that post should under quickstart/static/proper/image1.png Add ![image1](image1.png) into proper.md Rebuild and redeploy your blog, the image1 will show!
title: Deploy Hugo and Further

content: Hugo With LoveIt Theme Configuration This post is for MacOS and Homebrew User
title: Hugo and LoveIt Theme Config

content: 1. Install Hugo # Install hugo by homebrew brew install hugo # Make sure that you install hugo successfully hugo version # Cd to Desktop directory cd Desktop # Create new hugo site in Desktop directory hugo new site quickstart
title: Hugo and LoveIt Theme Config

content: Install LoveIt Theme # Cd to quickstart directory cd quickstart # init your own git repository git init # Install LoveIt theme from github git submodule add https://github.com/dillonzq/LoveIt.git themes/LoveIt # add and commit your site git add . git commit -m "Added LoveIt Theme"
title: Hugo and LoveIt Theme Config

content: Config Your Blog with LoveIt Theme Replace the content in the config.toml file with following configuration File config.toml just under the quickstart directory; baseURL = "https://yourgithubname.git.io" # [en, en, fr, pl, ...] determines default content language # [en, en, fr, pl, ...] 设置默认的语言 defaultContentLanguage = "en" # 网站语言, 仅在这里 CN大写 languageCode = "en" # 主题 theme = "LoveIt" # 网站标题 title = "东南亚摘椰子小熊猫" # 是否使用 robots.txt enableRobotsTXT = true # 是否使用 git 信息 enableGitInfo = true # 是否使用 emoji 代码 enableEmoji = true [languages] [languages.en] weight = 2 # 网站语言, 仅在这里 CN 大写 languageCode = "en" # 语言名称 languageName = "English" # 是否包括中日韩文字 hasCJKLanguage = true # 默认每页列表显示的文章数目 paginate = 12 # [UA-XXXXXXXX-X] 谷歌分析代号 googleAnalytics = "" # 版权描述，仅仅用于 SEO copyright = "This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License." # 菜单配置 [languages.en.menu] [[languages.en.menu.main]] identifier = "posts" # 你可以在名称 (允许 HTML 格式) 之前添加其他信息, 例如图标 pre = "" # 你可以在名称 (允许 HTML 格式) 之后添加其他信息, 例如图标 post = "" name = "Posts" url = "/posts/" title = "" weight = 1 [[languages.en.menu.main]] identifier = "tags" pre = "" post = "" name = "Tags" url = "/tags/" title = "" weight = 2 [[languages.en.menu.main]] identifier = "categories" pre = "" post = "" name = "Categories" url = "/categories/" title = "" weight = 3 # [[languages.en.menu.main]] # identifier = "about" # pre = "" # post = "" # name = "About" # url = "/about/" # title = "" # weight = 5 [[languages.en.menu.main]] identifier = "github" pre = "" post = "" name = "Github" url = "" title = "GitHub" weight = 6 # [[languages.en.menu.main]] # identifier = "friend" # pre = "" # post = "" # name = "Friends" # url = "/friend/" # title = "" # weight = 7 [languages.en.params] # 网站描述 description = "做题家小熊猫" # 网站关键词 keywords = ["Theme", "Hugo"] # 应用图标配置 [languages.en.params.app] # 当添加到 iOS 主屏幕或者 Android 启动器时的标题, 覆盖默认标题 title = "Red Panda" # 是否隐藏网站图标资源链接 noFavicon = false # 更现代的 SVG 网站图标, 可替代旧的 .png 和 .ico 文件 svgFavicon = "" # Android 浏览器主题色 themeColor = "#ffffff" # Safari 图标颜色 iconColor = "#5bbad5" # Windows v8-10 磁贴颜色 tileColor = "#da532c" # 搜索配置 [languages.en.params.search] enable = true # 搜索引擎的类型 ("lunr", "algolia") type = "algolia" # 文章内容最长索引长度 contentLength = 4000 # 搜索框的占位提示语 placeholder = "" # 最大结果数目 maxResultLength = 10 # 结果内容片段长度 snippetLength = 50 # 搜索结果中高亮部分的 HTML 标签 highlightTag = "em" # 是否在搜索索引中使用基于 baseURL 的绝对路径 absoluteURL = false [languages.en.params.search.algolia] index = "index.en" appID = "PASDMWALPK" searchKey = "b42948e51daaa93df92381c8e2ac0f93" # 主页信息设置 [languages.en.params.home] # RSS 文章数目 rss = 10 # 主页个人信息 [languages.en.params.home.profile] enable = true # Gravatar 邮箱，用于优先在主页显示的头像 gravatarEmail = "" # 主页显示头像的 URL avatarURL = "/images/avatar.jpg" # 主页显示的网站标题 (支持 HTML 格式) title = "" # 主页显示的网站副标题 subtitle = "东南亚砍香蕉小熊猫" # 是否为副标题显示打字机动画 typeit = true # 是否显示社交账号 social = true # 免责声明 (支持 HTML 格式) disclaimer = "" # 主页文章列表 [languages.en.params.home.posts] enable = true # 主页每页显示文章数量 paginate = 6 # 主页的社交信息设置 [languages.en.params.social] GitHub = "为了显示图标" Bilibili = "" Zhihu = "" Linkedin = "为了显示图标" Twitter = "" Instagram = "为了显示图标" Facebook = "为了显示图标" Telegram = "" Medium = "" Gitlab = "" Youtubelegacy = "" Youtubecustom = "" Youtubechannel = "" Tumblr = "" Quora = "" Keybase = "" Pinterest = "" Reddit = "" Codepen = "" FreeCodeCamp = "" Bitbucket = "" Stackoverflow = "" Weibo = "" Odnoklassniki = "" VK = "" Flickr = "" Xing = "" Snapchat = "" Soundcloud = "" Spotify = "" Bandcamp = "" Paypal = "" Fivehundredpx = "" Mix = "" Goodreads = "" Lastfm = "" Foursquare = "" Hackernews = "" Kickstarter = "" Patreon = "" # content: 3-0 Add Your Avatar Image If you are following every step above this post, so your Avatar Image should be underquickstart/static/images folder. Also, naming your avatar image as avatar.jpg
title: Hugo and LoveIt Theme Config

content: 3-1 Create Your First Post hugo new posts/first_post.md The default content in first_post.md: --- title: "{{ replace .Name "-" " " | title }}" date: {{ .Date }} draft: true --- The default content is generated by quickstart/archetypes/default.md, you can change the default content in that file! By default all posts and pages are created as a draft. So this first_post will not be shown in your site. Please do change draft: true to draft: false
title: Hugo and LoveIt Theme Config

content: 3-2 Start Hugo Server # add all change files to your master branch and commit git add . git commit -m "Finished init configuration of hugo as well as loveit theme" hugo server
title: Hugo and LoveIt Theme Config

content: 3-3 Visit Your Brand New Blog You can visit your blog locally: http://localhost:1313
title: Hugo and LoveIt Theme Config

content: 3-4 You Did It! As you can see, you cannot find your very first post in that blog. And when you click posts, the blog goes wrong! To fix this problem, you need to replace the content in quickstart/theme/loveit/layouts/partials/function/content.html by the following content: {{- $content := .Content -}} {{- if ne "" $content -}} {{- if .Ruby -}} {{- $content = partial "function/ruby.html" $content -}} {{- end -}} {{- if .Fraction -}} {{- $content = partial "function/fraction.html" $content -}} {{- end -}} {{- if .Fontawesome -}} {{- $content = partial "function/fontawesome.html" $content -}} {{- end -}} {{- $content = partial "function/checkbox.html" $content -}} {{- $content = partial "function/escape.html" $content -}} {{- end -}} {{- return $content -}} After that you can see your posts on both main page and posts subpage Do commit your blog folder to keep everything work! git add . git commit -m "Fixed the posts not show error"
title: Hugo and LoveIt Theme Config
